fields.name: adventurer
fields.desc: A welcome letter and information leaflet about the species you have adopted. The information leaflet goes into greater detail about the species' crucial role within the ecosystem and how you can help protect them and their welfare.

fields.name: warrior
fields.desc: A gift pack including a welcome letter, a photograph, information leaflet and custom mug relating to the species you have adopted. The information leaflet goes into greater detail about the species' crucial role within the ecosystem and how you can help protect them and their welfare.

fields.name: champion
fields.desc: A gift pack including a welcome letter, a photograph, information leaflet, custom mug and phone case relating to the species you have adopted. The information leaflet goes into greater detail about the species' crucial role within the ecosystem and how you can help protect them and their welfare.

fields.name: hero
fields.desc: A gift pack including a welcome letter, a photograph, information leaflet, custom mug, phone case and beautiful tote bag relating to the species you have adopted. The information leaflet goes into greater detail about the species' crucial role within the ecosystem and how you can help protect them and their welfare.
